newsitem.title: USA: Allied Group sets stock split, dividend.
newsitem.headline: Allied Group sets stock split, dividend.

text.p: Allied Group Inc said its board of directors authorized a three-for-two split of Allied Group common stock.
The directors also declared a fourth-quarter cash dividend of $0.15 a share on the post-split shares, a 2.3 percent increase over the previous quarter's payout.
The dividend will be payable December 26, 1996 to stockholders of record on December 12, 1996.
On November 29, 1996, the company will issue to stockholders of record on November 15, 1996 an additional share of common stock for every two shares they hold.
Fractional shares will be paid in cash. After the split, the number of common shares outstanding will increase to 20.3 million from 13.6 million.
